column4: help ! ... I cannot get ubuntu 12.04 to boot up from usb, my writer died, but I got version 11.10 to boot so I am in a live cd version right now, I have 12.04 iso downloaded, how can I do a fresh install of 12.04 from a 11.10 live cd boot
is it not possible to put the files on a partition, and boot from that?
fresh install 11.10 the sudo apt-get dist-upgrade (thats the right package right?)
